Name: Z`code (VR for HTC Vive)
About the game: 'Z'code is a First-Person Mech Fighting game in VR. Players need to control their own combat armor to complete a series of combat missions. Operation: The game uses the cockpit perspective, the player plays the rack driver to operate the huge war machine to carry on the battle with the enemy; Skills: Destroying the enemy will get you energy. After getting the energy, the player can release the power of brilliant skills with great effects; Items: Killing the enemy may drop items players can pick up to gain additional effects, such as increasing the maximum bullets, invincibility, damage reduction, more blood, more points and integral percentage.'
Developers: Shenzhen Weilaishijie Network Technology Co., Ltd.
Publishers: Shenzhen Weilaishijie Network Technology Co., Ltd.
